original_text: When Zedekiah king of Judah and all the soldiers saw them, they fled; they left the city at night by way of the king’s garden, through the gate between the two walls, and headed toward the Arabah.
korean_text: 유다의 시드기야 왕과 모든 군사가 그들을 보고 도망하되 밤에 왕의 동산 길을 따라 두 담 샛문을 통하여 성읍을 벗어나서 아라바로 갔더니

sentences.original_text: When Zedekiah king of Judah and all the soldiers saw them
sentences.korean_translation: 유다 왕 시드기야와 모든 군사들이 그들을 보았을 때

sentences.original_text: they left the city at night
by way of the king's garden
through the gate between the two walls
